Description.Text: Nammbu Beachfront Bungalows is a relaxing 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in Puerto Carrillo in Guanacaste province. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool and a superb beachfront location. Puerto Carrillo is a small and unspoilt coastal town situated along the Pacific Coast of Guanacaste Province. It boasts a handful of hotels and restaurants and retains an authentic Costa Rican atmosphere. The hotel is housed in a collection of bungalows right on the beachfront. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool. Deluxe rooms are decorated in a modern, rustic style. Amenities include a balcony, flat-screen TV, and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy local and international dishes at the onsite restaurant, or a range of drinks at the bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite.
